ImportPlaylist.Title: Import YouTube Playlist
ImportPlaylist.Notes: Enter a youtube playlist url or playlist ID below and click the import button next to it to get started.

Messages.AlreadyWorking: Playlist is currently being imported, please wait
Messages.InvalidKey: Please enter a valid youtube playlist url (with list in the querystring) or a playlist ID
Messages.Error: Error importing playlist - check the console for details
Messages.KeyNotFound: Playlist with key {playlistKey} does not exist - check the url or id and try again
